page.title: 09ST.MATTHEW'S SCHOOL & CHURCH
page.content: Our school is not very big. It's got about 160 pupils in it. It has got a playground which is quite big but no playing field near the school building. Next door is St. Matthew's Church which has a large steeple pointing to the sky. It has a vicarage in the grounds where our vicar, Mr. Barnes, lives. The school is over 100 years old. It has high windows and some of the brick doorways are still arched. In the church there are stained-glass windows with many pictures of Jesus on them. Both the church and the school are built of grey stone. Around the windows are barriers so people can't break them. At the side of the church is a school garden. We made a high fence to go around the garden so that nobody can damage the flowers and plants.
